short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: just a little widget to see what's up with the moon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MoonFaze is a simple, clean extension that shows the current phase of the moon. It's pleasing to look at, doesn't take up much space, and isn't cluttered with extras. Also available in German, via a small toggle at the bottom. 

version 1.1 contains minor bug fixes
